sentences.sentence: Three-fourths of the apartments in the ghetto had no heat.
sentences.translation: 贫民区有四分之三的公寓没有暖气。

sentences.sentence: The south coast of Spain has become something of a tourist ghetto.
sentences.translation: 西班牙南海岸可以说已经成为旅游者的聚居区。

sentences.sentence: One of the most atmospheric corners of Prague is the old Jewish ghetto.
sentences.translation: 布拉格最具神韵的街角之一是老犹太人区。
